N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 55.4 - Approval

State Regulations

It shall not be necessary to submit samples to secure
formal approval of padded visors, visor holders and padded instrument panels
fom the Commissioner of Motor Vehicles. Any such padded visor, visor holder, or
padded instrument panel shall be deemed approved by the commissioner upon
receipt of a certificate from the manufacturer that such items of equipment
meet the standards and performance criteria of this regulation, or those
promulgated by the United States Department of Transportation. Manufacturers
shall conduct appropriate performance testing in a facility acceptable to the
commissioner to assure that such equipment meets the requirements of this
regulation. A report containing the performance data as demonstrated by such
testing shall be submitted to the department for review. The failure to submit
such report may result in cancellation of the approval of such equipment in
this State. Notes
